question: Which Indian state/UT launched the 'Mukhya Mantri Health Card' scheme, during its budget?
explanation:
The Delhi Government has recently presented its budget in the Assembly. The Deputy Chief Minister of Delhi Manish Sisodia presented the first budget of the AAP government\'s second term.
The government of Delhi announced the \'Mukhya Mantri Health Card\' scheme for the people of Delhi. Under this scheme, health ID cards will be prepared and distributed to all the residents of Delhi. It will be linked to the hospital information management system across all the health centres of the government.
